direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate the top of the stack but perform opposite operations (push adds, pop removes).
Both methods interact with the top of the stack and handle similar exception scenarios (EmptyStackException).
Both methods access elements in the stack, though for different purposes (push adds, search finds).
The push method internally calls add, making them functionally similar in adding elements to the stack.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the stack with a specific size can be useful for setting up the test environment.
Popping elements can be used to test the state of the stack before and after pushing an element.
Peeking at the top element can be used to verify the correct element was pushed onto the stack.
